title: Varg Vikernes
summary: Louis Cachet[1] (born Kristian Vikernes; 11 February 1973), better known as Varg Vikernes (Norwegian: [ˈvɑrɡ ˈvìːkəɳeːs]), is a Norwegian musician and convicted murderer best known for his early black metal albums and later crimes. His first four records, issued under the name Burzum from 1991 to 1994, made him one of the most influential figures in black metal.[2][3][4] In 1994, he was convicted of murder and arson, and subsequently served 15 years in prison.[5]
